mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NAVER_WEBTOON (WEBTOON_NUM, WEBTOON_TITLE, WEBTOON_AGE, WEBTOON_INFO) VALUES (N_W_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{webtoonTitle}, #{webtoonAge}, #{webtoonInfo})

INSERT INTO WEBTOON_WEEK (WEBTOON_WEEK_NUM, WEBTOON_NUM, WEEK_NUM) SELECT W_W_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS WEBTOON_WEEK_NUM, WEBTOON_NUM, (SELECT WEEK_NUM FROM WEEK WHERE WEEK.WEEK_DAY =#{weekDay}) AS WEEK_NUM FROM NAVER_WEBTOON WHERE WEBTOON_TITLE = #{webtoonTitle} AND WEBTOON_INFO = #{webtoonInfo}
INSERT INTO WEBTOON_GENRE VALUES (#{genreType}, #{webtoon_TITLE}, (SELECT webtoon_NUM FROM NAVER_WEBTOON WHERE webtoon_TITLE = #{webtoon_TITLE} AND webtoon_INFO = #{webtoon_INFO}))
